ch0252_40_kabu/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re looking fired up today.
ch0252_40_kabu/0101_0701_02_10:
Care to join me on a run to school? It’s a
good way to train while commuting!
ch0252_40_kabu/7101_0701_01_10:
Whenever I see students in the schoolyard
giving their all at a sport, I can’t help but
get fired up.
ch0252_40_kabu/7101_0701_02_10:
Before I know it, I’m cheering at the top of
my lungs.
ch0252_40_kabu/7101_0701_03_10: My voice is always hoarse after class!
ch0252_40_kabu/7102_0701_02_10:
Sometimes, when you don’t see results right
away, you may feel frustrated or upset...
ch0252_40_kabu/7102_0701_03_10:
But keeping at it—without throwing in the
towel—is key.
ch0252_40_kabu/7103_0701_01_10: Studying in school is important, of course...
ch0252_40_kabu/7103_0701_02_10:
But so is spending time with classmates and
friends!
ch0252_40_kabu/7103_0701_03_10:
To make the most of school, do your best to
learn and enjoy yourself!
ch0252_40_kabu/7104_0701_01_10:
Don’t just keep pushing yourself. Taking a
breather is important too!
ch0252_40_kabu/7104_0701_02_10:
Afterward, you’ll come blazing back in
full force!
ch0252_40_kabu/7105_0701_01_10: Learning is important at any age!
ch0252_40_kabu/7105_0701_02_10:
Studying with you all at the academy
reminded me of that!
ch0252_40_kabu/7105_0701_03_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll be right by
your side as we continue to learn!
ch0252_40_kabu/1701_0701_01_10: There’s something I want to give you!
ch0252_40_kabu/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you find a use for it in your studies!
ch0252_40_kabu/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m a Gym Leader in Galar, but I started off
in the Hoenn region.
ch0252_40_kabu/2501_0701_02_10:
So while I can talk about Galar, I can also
talk about what makes Hoenn great, too!
ch0252_40_kabu/2501_0702_01_10:
Hoenn is full of nature and has a warm
climate.
ch0252_40_kabu/2501_0702_02_10:
And it has plenty of places perfect for
training!
ch0252_40_kabu/2511_0701_01_10: The Hoenn region has a cycling road.
ch0252_40_kabu/2511_0701_02_10:
You can cycle there as long as you have
a bike.
ch0252_40_kabu/2511_0701_03_10:
There are two kinds of bike—the Mach Bike
and the Acro Bike.
ch0252_40_kabu/2511_0701_04_10:
I’ve been wondering which would be better
for lower body training. What do you think?
ch0252_40_kabu/2511_0702_01_10:
If you’re looking for an easy cycling course,
I recommend Route 117.
ch0252_40_kabu/2511_0702_02_10:
It’s full of nature, with a straight path
leading all the way to Verdanturf Town—
great for enjoying the fresh air!
ch0252_40_kabu/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Let’s get on today’s training!
Hup, two, three, four!
ch0252_40_kabu/3003_0701_01_10:
We must make sure we replenish our fuel so
we can keep burning!
ch0252_40_kabu/3005_0701_01_10:
That’s enough for today’s training. Rest up so
you can be in top condition.
